def_cn: (尤指古代竖立的)单块巨石，独石柱
def_en: A monolith is a very large, upright piece of stone, especially one that was put in place in ancient times.

def_cn: 庞大而僵化的组织；单一庞大的体系
def_en: If you refer to an organization or system as a monolith, you are critical of it because it is very large and very slow to change, and it does not seem to have different parts with different characters.
